Params: {2: 'Mother', 3: "Is it all ready? Liv, they'll be picking you up... soon."}

{2: 'Brother', 3: "Father's made arrangements already. When you're in the war zone, just work safely in the back as a medical officer. As for father... he's got work still and can't be here. You understand, right?"}
{2: 'Sister', 3: "Um, that white dress of mine, you've always liked it, didn't you? I can tell... You can have it."}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Though you may be leaving this house, but you're still our family. Don't disgrace our name."}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Get changed, Liv... At least, you should leave gracefully. You can do it... I'm sure."}
{3: 'Before departing, Liv looks at herself one last time in the mirror...'}
